text: Gurugram University is a state university established by Haryana Act 17 of 2017 and started functioning from academic year 2018–19. It offers 2 years LL.M course. == References == == External links == * Or you can go here for more information about the college * https://www.gurugramuniversity.co Category:Universities and colleges in Gurgaon Category:Gurgaon Category:Educational institutions established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in India
title: Gurugram University
